# Setup

```{r auth, warning=FALSE}
library(googleAuthR)
library(googleCloudVertexAIR)

options(googleAuthR.scopes.selected = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform")

gar_auth_service(json_file = Sys.getenv("GAR_SERVICE_JSON"))
```

## Set global arguements

```{r gcva-global-arguements}
projectId <- Sys.getenv("GCVA_DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID")
gcva_region_set(region = "us-central1")
gcva_project_set(projectId = projectId)
```

## Text Generation 

https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/text/test-text-prompts

```{r}
text_generated <- gcva_text_gen_predict(
  prompt="Give me ten interview questions for the role of a Python software engineer.",
  modelId="text-bison"
)

cat(text_generated)
```


To get the full response, with `safteyAttributes` and metadata, set `rawResponse = TRUE`

```{r}
text_generated_raw <- gcva_text_gen_predict(
  prompt="Give me ten interview questions for the role of a Python software engineer.",
  modelId="text-bison",
  rawResponse = TRUE
)

cat(text_generated_raw$predictions$content)
```

```{r}
text_generated_raw$predictions$safetyAttributes
```

## Text Embeddings 

* Doc: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/embeddings/get-text-embeddings
* API: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/model-reference/text-embeddings


```{r}
text_embeddings <- gcva_get_text_embeddings(text = "What is life?")
text_embeddings
```

```{r}
length(text_embeddings)
```
